description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Defeat your friends in a soccer game like you have never done  before - TURN-BASED!!! Select your favorite nation from MORE THAN 36 Teams from all over the World (37 Teams to be precise ;)
